selected_skills.name: extract_rectangle_dimensions_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the side length of the square from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the side length of the square from the image data.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the perimeter of the square using the extracted side length.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the perimeter by multiplying the side length by 4.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated perimeter into the required answer format.
